casebody.data:
NEW ORLEANS RIVERWALK MARKETPLACE, LLC
v.
The LOUISIANA TAX COMMISSION and Errol G. Williams, in his capacity as Assessor for the Parish of Orleans Norman S. Foster, as Ex-Officio Tax Collector for the City of New Orleans and the City of New Orleans NO. 2018-C-0889 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 28, 2018

Denied.

CLARK, J., would grant and docket.
